about_the_game:
Game Name


Nodes Escape

Description of false positive virus


This game is packaged by nw.js. Recently, it has been found that Windows Defender may false positive viruses, and the startup files may be automatically deleted, resulting in the inability to open the game.
At present, the software report has been submitted to Microsoft, and the false positive can be bypassed by trusting the file first.
Sorry to cause trouble to you, we are just ordinary independent game developers, we will not do those shameless things, please rest assured.
Related issues can be viewed:

⚠️ Notice Regarding English Content


Currently, the English content is translated by machine. Due to cultural differences, some puzzles may be difficult for players in non-Chinese-speaking regions to understand.
We apologize if this affects your gaming experience, and we are committed to improving this aspect of our content in the future.

Game Description


This is a word puzzle game full of wisdom and challenges that will immerse you in the mysterious world of secret rooms and challenge your logical thinking and vocabulary knowledge. In the game, you will be faced with a tricky puzzle to find the hidden clues and solve the puzzle so as to open the door to freedom.

Key Features


  • Rich level design: the game contains several levels, each with a unique theme and tight puzzles waiting for players to challenge.
  • Unique word puzzle: Combining the features of word games, puzzle games and room escape games, it provides a unique gaming experience.
  • Intellectual Challenge: The puzzles in the game are designed to test your logical reasoning, observation and knowledge base, allowing you to exercise your brain in an entertaining way.
  • Achievement System: Unlock a variety of achievements to show off your achievements and strengths in the game!

Gameplay


1. After entering the game, it is best to go through the Beginner's guide to get familiar with the basic operation
2. It is recommended to play the level mode first, from simple to difficult. You can click to see the hints if you can't solve the puzzle
3. more node features, more fun level design, waiting for you to explore!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

name: Nodes Escape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3230M CPU @ 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-3220
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: The game presents realistic game graphics through sound effects, narration and imagination. The level design is subtle and challenging, allowing players to challenge their intelligence and logic skills in solving puzzles.
